view.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse
view.subtitle: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

blocks.title: Adversary Hold Abuse completed
blocks.message: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Product Variant and Bundle Storefront. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The First-Confirm-First-Booked Waitlist. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
